title: Sell Shriram Transport Finance Company, target price Rs 1030: Kotak Securities - Economic Times
content: Sell Shriram Transport Finance Company, target price Rs 1030: Kotak Securities  Economic Times
description: Shriram Transport Finance Company Ltd., incorporated in the year 1979, is a Large Cap company (having a market cap of Rs 28803.59 Crore) operating in NBFC sector.
